text: Franco Landella (born 1 May 1966 in Foggia) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the centre-right party Forza Italia. He was elected Mayor of Foggia on 8 June 2014 and took his office on 11 June. He has been re-elected for a second term in 2019. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *2019 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Foggia ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Foggia Category:Forza Italia (2013) politicians
title: Franco Landella
